state.title: Sample due
state.description: Sample yet to be taken into the lab for analysis

state.title: Sample preparation
state.description: A sample preparation workflow is in progress

state.title: Sampled
state.description: Sampling completed, Sampler, Date Sampled and Field analysis results captured

state.title: To be preserved
state.description: Sample was identified as requiring preservation

variable.description: The ID of the user who performed the last transition
